tutorial.speak:
To give someone access to the church directory, first log into Chums and search for the person who needs access.
Once you've found their record, click the edit pencil icon to modify their information.
In the edit view, click on the membership status field.
From the dropdown menu, select "Member" as their membership status.
Finally, click the Save button to apply the changes. This will grant them access to the church directory.
